bike.description: M5 aluminum, 29" geometry, tapered headtube, PF30 BB, ISCG '05 mount, internal Command Post BlackLite routing, 142+ dropouts, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, removable Taco Blade, 155mm travel
